mapper.update: UPDATE lms_question q SET q.answer = ( SELECT LISTAGG(o.value, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY o.value) FROM lms_q_options o WHERE o.qid = q.qid AND o.checked = 'true' ) WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM lms_q_options o WHERE o.qid = q.qid AND o.checked = 'true' )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM lms_q_options WHERE qid = #{qid} AND ((SELECT type FROM lms_question where qid = #{qid}) = 1 OR (SELECT type FROM lms_question where qid = #{qid}) = 2) ORDER BY value ASC
